Translations.Name: AAbandonedPropulsionDevicesDesc
Translations.ZHCN:
${PlanetName}的其中一个大坑中心有外星工艺制造的金属机械。
我们认为这些大型机械是用于推动整个星球的。其目的便是将${PlanetName}从原先轨道中推出，但目的地不明。将这些推动装置进行拆卸与分析，或许可以提升我方的推进科技。
Translations.ENUS:
One of the large craters in ${PlanetName} has metal machinery made by alien craft in the center.
We believe that these large machines were used to propel the entire planet. Their purpose is to push ${PlanetName} out of its original orbit, but the destination is unknown. Disassembling and analyzing these propulsion devices may allow us to improve our propulsion technology.
